description: Cooper was spending a typical day at home. Of course everyone has a different typical day. Cooper's ideal typical day is spent lounging naked in his hot roommate's bed and sniffing his underwear. Cooper has done this about 3 times a week for over a year. He waits till his roomie leaves a pair of underwear from the gym the night before and then sneaks into his room and smells the wonderfulness of man and until today he was never caught. All good things, however, must come to an end but he managed to convince his shocked roommate to let him suck him off. Of course we all know what a blowjob leads to and before he knew it, Cooper was being plowed in his hungry ass by his hot, muscular roommate. And this good thing ends in a magnificent creamy finale.
title: Fits Like A Glove
